content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Welcome, captain: enjoy Sinley Bay’s best. Get 80% off the standard market rate on a massive group of items: take the helm of the PCF Morningstar Hero Ship, progress faster with 14 days of Elite Status, customize any medium dreadnought with the Dragon pattern—and more.

The Dreadnought Welcome bundle also includes the Reaper emblem collection, 20,000 Credits to use in your ship tech trees as well as a beanie in male and female styles. In addition, you can use the PCF Morningstar’s legendary cosmetic parts to customize any Akula Vektor dreadnought. Limit one bundle per account.


1 player
Network Players 2-10

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

attributes.name: The Dreadnought Welcome bundle
